body.p: Last week Indian reporter got in pretty bad when he tell in Indian News about going to have medicine dance at Watermill place Saturday night and some Indians got pretty mad and tell Indian reporter way I put in paper look like everybody could come and don’t want any white people and bawl me out pretty bad. Government orders say only for Indians that belong to medicine lodge and no other Indians wanted and no white people too. They tell Indian reporter about going to put up big sign that tell no white people wanted and just Indian medicine lodge and it going to be that way next time, Saturday night Indians going to have medicine lodge dance at Black River Falls. War look pretty bad and everybody talk about it and some time people tell about America maybe have to fight too. Indian reporter remember last time have war and lot of people killed that time too and people come to Indian house where people live and put finger at young Indian fellow and say you got to go in war and go to Europe where they never been and don’t tell him and he don’t know what war is about and have to go and do same thing. Indian reporter want to say white man all time about bad Indians kill in war long time back and want to make Indian do same thing like smart fellow white man and then have war and kill people and I don’t think very smart when make young fellows go to war and get killed and don’t know what was is about. I want to say one thing pretty sure when Indian kill long time back and have war just same thing like this and Indian know what war is about too and white man school all time talk about make Indian smart like white man. Indian in this country all everybody happy and don’t want to have war and Indian reporter think same thing too and I want to tell it to folks like that. Next thing I want to tell folks pretty soon Winnebago Indians everywhere Wisconsin, Minnesota, Iowa go to La Crosse and have big Indian dance and help white man name new bridge that go over Mississippi river and same think like have name for baby and call it “Blackhawk” bridge and have bridge open same time and going to be 23rd September. Grace Redman and Herbie from Wyeville go to Indian hospital and Grace return to home and he stay there and doctor tell him why don’t get well pretty quick. Indians all over everywhere rake cranberries now and people tell Indian reporter why don’t rake cranberries and don’t know I have bad heart and doctor tell me not to do work like that and I rake cranberries when I was young fellow and every year until two three years ago. Curtis Redbird he is my grandson and Friday he go to Pipestone Minnesota and go to boarding school and leave from Indian hospital and six other boys go same time, two Oneida Indians and others all Winnebago. When he go away he tell me “You take care of yourself and if everything all o.k. I come home when have first vacation” and feel pretty bad and want to go to school pretty bad too. .
